item.title: Past Behavior
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: From Ask About the Past Rather Than the Future: Our past behavior is much more predictive of our future behavior than any prediction we might make ourselves about our future behavior. This quote was in reference to potential new customers, but the same is true for existing customers.
item.content:encoded:
From Ask About the Past Rather Than the Future:

Our past behavior is much more predictive of our future behavior than any prediction we might make ourselves about our future behavior.

This quote was in reference to potential new customers, but the same is true for existing customers.
